overview_of_class: This course covers the definition of a function; trigonometric, exponential, logarithmic and inverse functions; graphs, limits, continuity; derivative of a function; product, quotient and chain rule; implicit differentiation; linear approximation and differentials; related rates; mean value theorems; curve plotting; optimization problems; Newton's method; and antiderivatives.
name: Differential Calculus of One Variable Functions
title: SCS MATH 220-CN-64 Differential Calculus of One Variable Functions

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course covers the definition of a function; trigonometric, exponential, logarithmic and inverse functions; graphs, limits, continuity; derivative of a function; product, quotient and chain rule; implicit differentiation; linear approximation and differentials; related rates; mean value theorems; curve plotting; optimization problems; Newton's method; and antiderivatives.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Three years of high school math, including trigonometry, or MATH 113.

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value: The definition of a function; trigonometric, exponential, logarithmic and inverse functions; graphs, limits, continuity; derivative of a function; product, quotient and chain rule; implicit differentiation; linear approximation and differentials; related rates; mean value theorems; curve plotting; optimization problems; Newton's method; and antiderivatives

subject: MATH
